document_notes.text:
This update for pixman fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-44638: Fixed an integer overflow in pixman_sample_floor_y leading to heap out-of-bounds write (bsc#1205033).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: In libpixman in Pixman before 0.42.2, there is an out-of-bounds write (aka heap-based buffer overflow) in rasterize_edges_8 due to an integer overflow in pixman_sample_floor_y.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
